Call for proposals – Caribbean, 2016

GBIF expects to issue a call for proposals for the Caribbean ACP countries in the second quarter of 2016. Look for more information in early 2016.

Sign up for the BID mailing list to receive timely updates.

This programme is funded by the European Union
